markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Stalwart's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=480)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Fall of Plaguestone</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 58</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fairly simple ring has no gemstone inlaid, but the band is cast to resembled a fanged wolf’s head. Once per day, during your daily preparations, you can meditate on this ring to grant yourself 5 temporary Hit Points. These last until your next daily preparation, as long as you are wearing the ring.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stalwart's Ring
